Title: Review of Operational Challenges and Solutions for DER Integration with Distribution Networks
Authors: Akhtar Hussain Javed, P. Nguyen, J. Morren, J. Slootweg
Abstract summary: The paper reviews operational challenges and solutions for integrating distributed energy resources with distribution networks, but does not specifically address human operator challenges.

Title: On Integrating and Operating Distributed Energy Resources in Distribution Networks: A Review of Current Solution Methods, Challenges, and Opportunities
Authors: J. Guzmán-Henao, Rubén Iván Bolaños, O. Montoya, L. Grisales-Noreña, Harold R. Chamorro
Abstract summary: This paper reviews challenges and opportunities in integrating and operating distributed energy resources in distribution networks, but does not mention field studies examining human operator challenges.

Title: Transactive control: a framework for operating power systems characterized by high penetration of distributed energy resources
Authors: Junjie Hu, Guangya Yang, K. Kok, Yusheng Xue, H. Bindner
Abstract summary: The paper discusses transactive control as a framework for operating power systems with high penetration of distributed energy resources.

Title: Operational Issues of Contemporary Distribution Systems: A Review on Recent and Emerging Concerns
Authors: Kabulo Loji, Sachin Sharma, Nomhle Loji, Gulshan Sharma, P. Bokoro
Abstract summary: This paper reviews operational challenges in contemporary distribution systems with increasing distributed energy resources, but does not specifically mention field studies on human operator challenges.

Title: Distributed Control for Distributed Energy Resources: Long-Term Challenges and Lessons Learned
Authors: S. O. Muhanji, A. Muzhikyan, A. Farid
Abstract summary: This paper discusses long-term challenges in distributed control for distributed energy resources, but does not mention field studies examining human operator challenges.

Title: Ensuring System Reliability: Distributed Energy Resources and Bulk Power System Considerations
Authors: C. Vartanian, R. Bauer, L. Casey, C. Loutan, D. Narang, Vishal Patel
Abstract summary: The paper discusses the challenges and benefits of integrating distributed energy resources (DERs) into the power grid, but does not mention field studies examining human operator challenges.

Title: Evaluating Distribution System Operators: Automated Demand Response and Distributed Energy Resources in the Flexibility4Chile Project
Authors: J. Guerrero, Enrique Personal, Sebastian Garcia Caro, Antonio Parejo, M. Rossi, Antonio García, Ricardo Perez Sanchez, C. León
Abstract summary: The paper discusses the challenges distribution system operators face in managing distributed energy resources, but does not mention field studies examining human operator challenges.

Title: TSO/DSO coordination in a context of distributed energy resource penetration
Authors: Michael Birk, J. Ávila, T. Román, R. Tabors
Abstract summary: The paper examines the coordination challenges between TSOs, DSOs, and distributed energy resource operators in the context of increasing DER penetration.
